ygData.subject: Another survey
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, here s what you re supposed to do. Copy (not forward) this entire email and paste it onto a new email that you will send. Change all of the answers so they
ygData.messageBody:
OK, here's what you're supposed to do. Copy (not forward) this entire email
and paste it onto a new email that you will send. Change all of the answers
so they apply to you. Then, send this to a whole bunch of people you know

INCLUDING the person who sent it to you. The theory is that you will learn a
lot of little known facts about you're friends. Remember to send it back to
the person who sent it to you. I know its long, but it really is quite
interesting!

MY ANSWERS:

0. NAME? Amanda Ramsey
1. LIVING ARRANGEMENT? Me, my boyfriend, and a roommate.
2. WHAT BOOK ARE YOU READING NOW? The Icewind Dale Trilogy
3. WHAT'S ON YOU'RE MOUSE PAD? Some stupid Compaq bullshit.
4. FAVORITE BOARDGAME? Monopoly
5. FAVORITE SMELLS? Vanilla, Pipe, My boyfriend's cologne; I think it's called Azul.
6. LEAST FAVORITE SMELLS? Cleaner
7. FAVORITE SOUND? Beethoven
8. WORST FEELING IN THE WORLD? Someone telling you they don't love you anymore.
9. FIRST THOUGHT IN THE MORNING? Dammit, I don't want to go to work!
10. FAVORITE COLOR? Green
11.HOW MANY RINGS BEFORE YOU ANSWER THE PHONE? None.
12. FUTURE CHILDS NAME? Um... Aidyn?
13. WHAT IS MOST IMPORTANT IN LIFE? Beauty, Freedom, Truth and Love? <--- Agree with James
14. FAVORITE FOOD? Japanese food, especially Sushi, Gyoza, and chicken teriyaki
15. CHOCOLATE OR VANILLA? Chocolate
16. DO YOU LIKE TO DRIVE FAST? Yes!
17. DO YOU SLEEP WITH A STUFFED TOY? Yeah, my hippo.
18. STORMS - COOL OR SCARY? So damn cooL!
19. WHAT TYPE WAS YOUR FIRST CAR? Pontiac Grand Prix
20. IF YOU COULD MEET ONE PERSON DEAD OR ALIVE? Um, Kurgt Cobain?
21. FAVORITE SONG? The Space Between
22. FAVORITE BOOK? Wheel of Time- The Great Hunt
23. DO YOU EAT THE STEMS OF BROCCOLI? Yes
24. IF YOU COULD HAVE ANY JOB YOU WANTED WHAT WOULD IT BE?  Hmm, Either something to do with Oceanography or Psychology.
25. IF YOU COULD DYE YOUR HAIR ANY COLOR? Then I'd have already done it.
26. EVER BEEN IN LOVE? Yes
27. IS THE GLASS HALF EMPTY OR HALF FULL? It depends.
28. FAVORITE MOVIES? The Shining
29. DO YOU TYPE WITH YOUR FINGERS ON THE RIGHT KEYS? No
30. WHATS UNDER YOUR BED? The floor.
31. WHATS YOUR FAVOURITE NUMBER?   6
32. WHATS YOUR FAVORITE SPORT TO WATCH? Football
33. SAY ONE NICE THING ABOUT THE PERSON WHO SENT THIS TO YOU: He's a great person and lots o' fun!
34. PERSON YOU SEND THIS TO MOST LIKELY TO RESPOND? John?
35. PERSON YOU SEND THIS TO THAT IS LEAST LIKELY TO RESPOND? James, seeing as how he already did it.
36. ARE YOU IN A RELATIONSHIP AT THIS MOMENT? Yes.
37. IF SO WHAT IS HIS/HER NAME? John
39. DOES HE/SHE LOVE YOU? I think so.
40. HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT OF YOU AND UR BOYFRIEND /GIRLFRIEND EVER GETTING
MARRIED? It's a bit too early to think about that. But I guess I have thought about it.



~Amanda
